q1: How do I change column alignment?
a1: Click the arrow button (← ↔ →) below each column header to cycle between left, center, and right alignment.
a2: Yes, use the row and column number inputs to add more rows or columns. Data in existing cells is preserved.
q3: Is the output compatible with GitHub?
a3: Yes, the generated Markdown table is fully compatible with GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) and most Markdown parsers.
